name: Masked
author: Kurama
notes: Tried a few different versions of Masked Heroes, but felt limited by the lack of Malicious and D Draw. I tried running the Drill dark with both Destiny Calling and Restart, but both were a little too inconsistent. Then tried to work on a 2 vyon version and this was what I used  to get from 8k to 18k in stage 2, so mirror wall was really only in there for the mirror
